Lesson learnt - if encountered any issue  don‚Äôt call merchants/service providers straight away. If 2% of members in this group called them  that is about 400 calls bombard them every day. They will sure one day raise white flag.Imaging you receive 400 calls a day asking the same question  you will soon terminate the phone line n change phone number.üòÇThat is about receive one call every 1-2 minutes during office hour.
